title: Legendary/Ultimate Skins + Mistery Gift
body:
Last year there was a ''thing'' , that if we gifted a ultimate/legendary skin to one of our friends we would get a mistery gift, and if we got an ultimate or legendary skin we would get another mistery gift.
I gifted my friend the skin ''Project Ashe'' and i didn't get any mistery gift....And my friend gifted me ''DunkMaster Darius''.
Did u guys ''turn off'' that project that u implemented last year?
If yes please explain me why it was a really good idea...

Thanks for reading! :)

replies.body: I'm not aware of any event like that happening right now.  Sometimes, special events can enable features like that so I recommend bookmarking our [Sales](http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/store/sales) page to stay up to date.  As an example, the most recent one I can think of is [baron steals ](http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/page/worlds-2016-hits-rift)during Worlds games.  So they may happen, but you have to be on the look out.  Good luck!
